DOC.brief_summary: In intervention study , investigator engage Vietnamese American nail salon owner train worker within salon reduce workplace chemical exposure . The long-term goal study reduce toxic chemical exposure nail salon promote worker health safety vulnerable worker population .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary hypothesis significantly great reduction measure level air contaminant among worker intervention group comparison group . The primary outcome interest workplace chemical exposure reduction . In addition , secondary hypothesis : 1 . The proportion worker increase knowledge workplace chemical exposure reduction ( WCER ) significantly great intervention group comparison group . 2 . The proportion worker report modify behavioral environmental factor facilitate WCER increase significantly intervention group comparison group . 3 . The proportion worker decrease work-related health problem great intervention group comparison group . As part secondary analysis , investigator also examine whether change knowledge behavior associate workplace chemical exposure reduction also whether change workplace chemical exposure associate improved health . The specific aim : 1 . Enhance exist workplace chemical exposure reduction ( WCER ) education material survey instrument target Vietnamese nail salon owner worker . 2 . Implement owner-to-worker intervention administer WCER education material . 3 . Evaluate effectiveness owner-to-worker WCER intervention : 1. reduce primary outcome measure personal level air contaminant ( e.g. , toluene , methyl methacrylate , methyl ethyl ketone , total volatile organic compound ) worker ; 2. influence secondary outcome include : ) increase worker knowledge WCER ii ) modify behavioral environmental factor promote WCER
DOC.criteria: Nail salon worker owner speak and/or write Vietnamese
